tasks: Developed Outlook Extension deployed to company staff
Created a malware analysis pipeline using the public framework, Karton, to streamline artifact analyses
Look into existing Living-Off-The-Land Binaries (LOLBins) and understand how taint-tracking is performed
Create a Ghidra taint-tracking script using Java
Research into the possibility of reversing a chosen Operating System's patches by leveraging on flaws in the update process
Create a proof-of-concept script to alter a chosen Operating System's information
Engaged with the community in cyber-related talks
Helped with the planning of the NEST platform, an educational mobile app aimed at educating and guiding youths in cybersecurity
Researched into online certifications and courses on cybersecurity
